messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] JAPAN WINS MELBOURNE CUP
messages.msgSnippet: Dear all, I say put the horses on the jockeys backs and make them run around that way. Down with horse racing. Richard ... [Non-text portions of this message
messages.messageBody:
Dear all, I say put the horses on the jockeys backs and make them run
around that way.

Down with horse racing.

Richard

messages.subject: JAPAN WINS MELBOURNE CUP
messages.msgSnippet: Dear All, Japan has just won 1st and 2nd in Australia s famous horse race the Melbourne Cup.  This is a truly historic occasion. Best regards, Barry Thomas.
messages.messageBody:
Dear All,

Japan has just won 1st and 2nd in Australia's famous horse race the Melbourne Cup. This is a truly historic occasion.

Best regards,

Barry Thomas.
(Melbourne, Australia)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
